definitions: Puts or sets down (something) in a specific place.
Stores or entrusts (money or valuables) in a bank or other financial institution.
Lays down (a layer of material) naturally.
Gives (a sum of money) as a first installment or as security.
examples: The river deposits silt on its banks.
She deposits her earnings in the bank every week.
The machine deposits the coins into the tray.
He deposits a down payment for the car.
